tuv.seg: Thank you for your participation. Please click next and then close the browser.
Nirringrazzjawk għall-parteċipazzjoni tiegħek. Jekk jogħġbok ikklikkja li jmiss u mbagħad agħlaq il-browser.

The European General Data Protection Regulation (GDPR) requires us to first speak to a parent or legal guardian of a teenager. Can I speak to this teenager’s parent or legal guardian? (SINGLE ANSWER, DO NOT READ OUT)

Ir-Regolament Ġenerali Ewropew dwar il-Protezzjoni tad-Data (GDPR) jeħtieġ li l-ewwel inkellmu ġenitur jew il-gwardjan legali taż-żagħżugħ(a). Nista' nitkellem mal-ġenitur jew il-gwardjan legali taż-żagħżugħ(a)? (TWEĠIBA WAĦDA, TAQRAX)

Hello, My name is …, from (NAME OF NATIONAL INSTITUTE), and I'm conducting an interview for Ipsos Public Affairs, on behalf of one of their clients. We are looking for people aged 16 or over who are willing to share their opinions about the issues of today’s society. We are conducting this survey across Europe. The survey is not part of any market research, we are interested in measuring public opinion.
I would be grateful if you could spare {#minutes_ins} minutes to participate in this survey. Participation in the survey is voluntary and you can change your mind at any time. All of your answers will remain confidential and will be combined with all other participants’ answers. This means you will not be identifiable in any of the published results. {#CONSENT_ins}
If you would like to read the Data Protection Notice, you can access it at {#intro_link}. This explains the purpose for processing your personal data as well as your data protection rights.
For quality assurance, this phone call may be monitored and recorded.
INTERVIEWER ADD IF ASKED: HOW DID YOU GET MY NUMBER: Your telephone number has been randomly generated by a computer, like all numbers we dial for this research. Our aim is to interview a representative sample of this country’s population.
CLIENT? Ipsos is conducting this survey for the {#Client}. Flash Eurobarometer surveys have as purpose to monitor public opinion in the European Union on a broad range of thematic issues.
WHAT PERSONAL DATA WILL BE COLLECTED: We use your phone number to invite you to take part in this interview and for quality control purposes only. Gender and age information will be collected, as well as personal data from the replies to the interview questions (such as marital status). All of the information you provide will remain confidential, your answers will be combined with all other participants’ answers, and no identifiable data will be shared with Ipsos’ client.
Are you happy to proceed with the interview? {#Birthday_ins}

Hello, Jisimni..., minn (ISEM TAL-ISTITUT NAZZJONALI), u qed inwettaq intervista għal Ipsos Public Affairs, f'isem wieħed mill-klijenti tagħhom. Qegħdin infittxu persuni minn 16-il sena 'l fuq li jixtiequ jaqsmu l-opinjonijiet tagħhom dwar il-kwistjonijiet tas-soċjetà tal-lum. Qed inwettqu dan l-istħarriġ madwar l-Ewropa. L-istħarriġ mhuwiex parti minn kwalunkwe riċerka tas-suq, aħna interessati li nkejlu l-opinjoni pubblika.
Napprezzaw jekk tikkonċedilna {#minutes_ins} ftit minuti biex tipparteċipa f'dan l-istħarriġ. Il-parteċipazzjoni f'dan l-istħarriġ hija volontarja, u inti tista' tibdel fehmtek fi kwalunkwe ħin. It-tweġibiet kollha tiegħek kollha se jibqgħu kunfidenzjali u se jiġu kombinati mat-tweġibiet tal-parteċipanti l-oħrajn kollha. Dan ifisser li inti mhux se tkun tista' tiġi identifikat(a) fi kwalunkwe mir-riżultati li jiġu ppubblikati. {#CONSENT_ins}
Jekk tixtieq taqra l-Avviż dwar il-Protezzjoni tad-Data, tista’ taċċessah fuq {#intro_link}. Dan jispjega l-iskop għall-ipproċessar tad-data personali tiegħek kif ukoll id-drittijiet ta' protezzjoni tad-data tiegħek.
Għal raġunijiet ta' kwalità, din it-telefonata tista' tiġi monitorjata u reġistrata.
INTERVISTATUR ŻID JEKK TIĠI MITLUB: KIF SIBT IN-NUMRU TIEGĦI: In-numru tat-telefon tiegħek ġie ġġenerat b'mod każwali minn kompjuter, bħan-numri kollha li nċemplu għal din ir-riċerka. L-għan tagħna huwa li nintervistaw kampjun rappreżentattiv tal-popolazzjoni ta' dan il-pajjiż.
IL-KLIJENT? Ipsos qed twettaq dan l-istħarriġ għal [{#Client}]. L-istħarriġiet tal-Flash Eurobarometer għandhom l-iskop li jimmonitorjaw l-opinjoni pubblika fl-Unjoni Ewropea dwar firxa wiesgħa ta' kwistjonijiet tematiċi.
LIEMA DATA PERSONALI SE TINĠABAR: Aħna nużaw in-numru tat-telefon tiegħek biex nistednuk tieħu sehem f'din l-intervista u għal skopijiet ta' kontroll tal-kwalità biss. Se tinġabar informazzjoni dwar il-ġeneru u l-età, kif ukoll data personali mit-tweġibiet għall-mistoqsijiet tal-intervista (bħall-istat ċivili). L-informazzjoni kollha li tipprovdi se tibqa' kunfidenzjali, it-tweġibiet tiegħek se jiġu kombinati mat-tweġibiet tal-parteċipanti l-oħra kollha, u l-ebda data identifikabbli mhi se tiġi maqsuma mal-klijent ta' Ipsos.
Tixtieq tkompli bl-intervista? {#Birthday_ins}

Approximately, what percentage of the value of your company's products and or services were sold to other EU Member States in {#CurrentYear_insert_1}? ADD, IF NEEDED: If you are not sure, please provide your best estimate. (READ OUT IF NECESSARY, ONE ANSWER ONLY)

Bejn wieħed u ieħor, x'perċentwal tal-valur tal-prodotti u/jew servizzi tal-kumpanija tiegħek inbiegħu lejn Stati Membri tal-UE oħrajn fl-{#CurrentYear_insert_1}? ŻID, JEKK MEĦTIEĠ: Jekk m'intix ċert(a), jekk jogħġbok agħti l-aħjar stima tiegħek. (AQRA JEKK MEĦTIEĠ, TWEĠIBA WAĦDA BISS)
Over the last year, would you say that this image you have of the EU improved, got worse or stayed about the same? {#SD15_ins}
F'din l-aħħar sena, tgħid li din l-immaġni li għandek tal-UE tjiebet, saret agħar jew baqgħet qisu l-istess? {#SD15_ins}
Activities of households as employers; undifferentiate goods and services producing activities of households for own use
ATTIVITAJIET TA' PERSUNI TAD-DAR BĦALA PERSUNI LI JĦADDMU; ATTIVITAJIET TA' PRODUZZJONI TA' OĠĠETTI U SERVIZZI MHUX IDDIFFERENZJATI GĦALL-UŻU TA' L-INDIVIDWU STESS
Electricity, gas, steam and air conditioning supply
PROVVISTA TA' ELETTRIKU, GASS, FWAR U ARJA KKONDIZZJONATA
Please enter a value between 0 and 20.
Jekk jogħġbok daħħal valur bejn 0 u 20.
Do you know if, in {#CurrentYear_insert_1}, your company has: (READ OUT, ONE ANSWER PER LINE)
Taf jekk, fi {#CurrentYear_insert_1}, il-kumpanija tiegħek: (AQRA, TWEĠIBA WAĦDA GĦAL KULL LINJA)
Don't know/No Answer (DO NOT READ OUT)
No, I am not the parent/legal guardian
Do you also use one or more mobile phones? {#D2_ins}
Tuża wkoll mowbajl wieħed jew iktar? {#D2_ins}
What is your nationality or nationalities if you hold more than one? {#D3a_ins}
X'inhi n-nazzjonalità tiegħek jew nazzjonalitajiet jekk għandek iktar minn waħda? {#D3a_ins}
Bejn l-1 ta' Jannar {#CurrentYear_insert_6} u l-1 ta' Jannar {#CurrentYear_insert_1}
Targeted respondent not available, call back later
Ir-rispondent fil-mira mhux disponibbli, ċempel aktar tard
I’m opposed to the idea of the European Union in general
Jien kontra l-idea tal-Unjoni Ewropea b'mod ġenerali
Which of the following statements regarding the European Union is closest to your opinion? {#D2_ins}
Liema mid-dikjarazzjonijiet li ġejjin dwar l-Unjoni Ewropea hija l-aktar qrib tal-opinjoni tiegħek? {#D2_ins}
None, sole trader (DO NOT READ OUT)
Please enter a value between {#D1_age_ins} and 105. If the respondent is less than {#D1_age_ins} years, select response “<{#D1_age_ins} years”.
Jekk jogħġbok daħħal valur bejn {#D1_age_ins} u 105. Jekk ir-rispondent għandu inqas minn {#D1_age_ins} snin, agħżel it-tweġiba “<{#D1_age_ins} snin”.
Do we have your permission to conduct this interview with your child?
Tagħtina l-permess tiegħek biex nagħmlu din l-intervista lil ibnek/bintek?
Owned or controlled entirely by persons from (THIS COUNTRY)
Proprjetà ta' jew ikkontrollata kompletament minn persuni minn Malta
Belt ta' daqs żgħir jew medju
I’m in favour of the European Union as it has been realised so far
Jien favur l-Unjoni Ewropea kif ġiet realizzata sa issa
15 years old, but not available/not at home
15-il sena, iżda mhux disponibbli/ ma jinsabx/tinsabx fid-dar
Below 10% owned by persons from other countries outside (THIS COUNTRY)
Inqas minn 10% proprjetà ta' persuni minn pajjiżi oħra barra minn Malta
Professjonist (impjegat bħala avukat, tabib, accountant, perit, ...)
Executive Agency for Small and Medium-sized Enterprises
Aġenzija Eżekuttiva għall-Intrapriżi Żgħar u Medji
When you get together with friends or relatives, would you say you discuss frequently, occasionally or never about...? {#SD14a_ins}
Meta tiltaqa' ma' ħbieb jew ma' qraba tista' tgħid li tiddiskutu spiss, kultant jew qatt dwar…? {#SD14a_ins}
Products to companies or other organisations
prodotti lil kumpaniji jew organizzazzjonijiet oħrajn
Don't know/No Answer (DO NOT READ OUT)
When was your company established? (READ OUT, ONE ANSWER ONLY)

The survey includes some questions that could be considered sensitive as they relate to political opinions. Your child may refuse to answer these questions at any time, and you can withdraw your consent for your child’s participation at any time.

L-istħarriġ jinkludi xi mistoqsijiet li jistgħu jitqiesu ta' natura sensittiva għaliex huma relatati ma' opinjonijiet politiċi. Ibnek jista' jirrifjuta li jwieġeb/Bintek tista' tirrifjuta li twieġeb għal dawn il-mistoqsijiet fi kwalunkwe ħin, u inti tista' tirtira l-kunsens tiegħek għall-parteċipazzjoni ta' ibnek/bintek fi kwalunkwe ħin.
Don't know/No Answer (DO NOT READ OUT)
The answer does not have enough text, current length is {LENGTH}, minimum is {MINLENGTH}.
It-tweġiba m’għandhiex biżżejjed test, it-tul attwali huwa {LENGTH}, il-minimu huwa {MINLENGTH}.

Those are all the questions we have for you today. Thank you for your time.

All information you provide is kept strictly confidential and is used for research purposes only.

Dawk huma l-mistoqsijiet kollha li għandna għalik illum. Grazzi tal-ħin tiegħek.

Kull informazzjoni li tipprovdi ser tibqa' strettament kunfidenzjali, u ser tiġi użata għall-għanijiet tar-riċerka biss.
Aktar minn 10 miljun ewro sa 50 miljun ewro

The survey includes some questions that could be considered sensitive as they relate to political opinions. You may refuse to answer these questions at any time, and you can withdraw your consent for participation at any time.

L-istħarriġ jinkludi xi mistoqsijiet li jistgħu jitqiesu ta' natura sensittiva għaliex huma relatati ma' opinjonijiet politiċi. Inti tista' tirrifjuta li twieġeb għal dawn il-mistoqsijiet fi kwalunkwe ħin, u tista' tirtira l-kunsens tiegħek għall-parteċipazzjoni fi kwalunkwe ħin.
Put through to the targeted respondent
Please enter a value between 15 and 105. If you are less than 15 years old, you are not eligible to participate in this study.
Jekk jogħġbok daħħal valur bejn 15 u 105. Jekk għandek inqas minn 15-il sena, m'intix eliġibbli biex tipparteċipa f'dan l-istudju.
Aktar minn 2 miljun ewro sa 10 miljun ewro
Water Supply; sewerage, waste management and remediation activities
PROVVISTA TA' L-ILMA; SISTEMA TA' DRENAĠĠI, IMMANIĠĠAR TA' L-ISKART U ATTIVITAJIET TA' RIMEDJAZZJONI
How old were you when you stopped full-time education? {#D4_ins}
Kemm kellek żmien meta waqaft l-edukazzjoni full-time tiegħek?
European Insurance and Occupational Pensions Agency
Aġenzija Ewropea tal-Assigurazzjoni u l-Pensjonijiet tax-Xogħol
16 years or older (will pass phone to start the interview)
16-il sena jew ikbar (se jgħaddi t-telefon biex tibda l-intervista)
Ħaddiem tal-id mingħajr sengħa (Unskilled manual worker)

Thank you for your time. We remind you that if you would like to read the Data Protection Notice, you can access it at {#intro_link}. This explains the purposes for processing your personal data as well as your rights under applicable data protection law.

Grazzi tal-ħin tiegħek. Nixtiequ nfakkruk li jekk tixtieq taqra l-Avviż dwar il-Protezzjoni tad-Data, inti tista' taċċessah fuq {#intro_link}. Dan jispjega l-iskop għall-ipproċessar tad-data personali tiegħek kif ukoll id-drittijiet tiegħek li japplikaw taħt il-liġi dwar il-protezzjoni tad-data applikabbli.
Consumers, Health, Agriculture and Food Executive Agency
Aġenzija Eżekuttiva għall-Konsumatur, is-Saħħa, l-Agrikoltura u l-Ikel
Servizzi ta' kummerċ, ta' akkomodazzjoni u tal-ikel
Do you use more than one mobile phone? {#D2_ins}
In which (region) is your company headquarers located?
F'liema (distrett) jinsabu l-uffiċċji prinċipali tal-kumpanija tiegħek?
The answer has too much text, current length is {LENGTH}, maximum is {MAXLENGTH}.
It-tweġiba fiha wisq test, it-tul attwali huwa {LENGTH}, il-massimu huwa {MAXLENGTH}.
Yes (will pass phone to start the interview)
Iva (se jgħaddi t-telefon biex tibda l-intervista)

(WHEN SPEAKING TO THE TARGETED RESPONDENT) Hello, My name is …, from (NAME OF NATIONAL INSTITUTE), and I'm conducting an interview for Ipsos Public Affairs, on behalf of one of their clients. We are contacting decision makers in companies across Europe regarding their views on current business topics. The feedback will be used to support policymaking in Europe. I would be grateful if you could spare {#minutes_ins} minutes to participate in this survey. Participation in the survey is voluntary and you can change your mind at any time. All of your answers will remain confidential and will be combined with all other participants’ answers. This means that neither you, nor your business, will be identifiable in any of the published results. For quality assurance, this phone call may be monitored and recorded. INTERVIEWER ADD IF ASKED: CLIENT? Ipsos is conducting this survey for the {#Client}. Flash Eurobarometer surveys have as purpose to monitor public and business opinion in the European Union on a broad range of thematic issues. WHAT PERSONAL DATA WILL BE COLLECTED: No personal data will be collected during this interview. Your participation, together with your individual responses to the questions, will be kept strictly confidential. If you have comments or questions, or any concerns, please send an email to: FlashEB-dataprotection-coordinator@ipsos-online.com Are you happy to proceed with the interview? (SINGLE ANSWER, DO NOT READ OUT)

(META TKUN QED TITKELLEM MAR-RISPONDENT FIL-MIRA) Hello, Jisimni …, minn (ISEM TAL-ISTITUT NAZZJONALI), u qed inwettaq intervista għal Ipsos Public Affairs, f'isem wieħed mill-klijenti tagħhom. Qed nikkuntattjaw lil persuni responsabbli għat-teħid ta' deċiżjonijiet f'kumpaniji madwar l-Ewropa dwar il-fehmiet tagħhom fuq suġġetti kummerċjali attwali. Dan il-feedback se jintuża biex jgħin fit-tfassil ta' politiki fl-Ewropa. Napprezzaw jekk għandek {#minutes_ins} ftit minuti biex tipparteċipa f'dan l-istħarriġ. Il-parteċipazzjoni f'dan l-istħarriġ hija volontarja, u inti tista' tibdel fehmtek fi kwalunkwe ħin. It-tweġibiet tiegħek kollha se jibqgħu kunfidenzjali u se jiġu kkombinati mat-tweġibiet tal-parteċipanti l-oħrajn kollha. Dan ifisser li la inti, u lanqas in-negozju tiegħek, mhu se tkunu tistgħu tiġu identifikati fi kwalunkwe mir-riżultati li jiġu ppubblikati. Għal raġunijiet ta' kwalità, din it-telefonata tista' tiġi mmonitorjata u rreġistrata. INTERVISTATUR ŻID JEKK TIĠI MITLUB: IL-KLIJENT? Ipsos qed twettaq dan l-istħarriġ għal {#Client}. L-istħarriġiet tal-Flash Eurobarometer għandhom l-iskop li jimmonitorjaw l-opinjoni pubblika u tan-negozji fl-Unjoni Ewropea dwar firxa wiesgħa ta' kwistjonijiet tematiċi. X'DATA PERSONALI SE TINĠABAR: Ebda data personali mhi se tinġabar waqt din l-interviesta. Il-parteċipazzjoni tiegħek, flimkien mat-tweġibiet individwali tiegħek għall-mistoqsijiet, se jinżammu strettament kunfidenzjali. Jekk għandek xi kummenti jew mistoqsijiet, jew kwalunkwe tħassib, jekk jogħġbok ibgħat email lil: FlashEB-dataprotection-coordinator@ipsos-online.com Tixtieq tkompli bl-intervista? (TWEĠIBA WAĦDA, TAQRAX)
Answer '{ANSWER}' cannot be combined with other answers.
It-tweġiba “{ANSWER}” ma tistax tiġi kkombinata mat-tweġibiet l-oħra.
(WRITE DOWN AGE IN YEARS IF RESPONDENT IS 15 YEARS OR OVER)
(IKTEB L-ETÀ FI SNIN JEKK IR-RISPONDENT GĦANDU 15-IL SENA JEW IKTAR)
The survey specific questions section ends here
The survey specific questions section ends here
Over the past two years, has your company's total number of employees increase, decreased or remained about the same? (DO NOT READ OUT, ONE ANSWER ONLY)
F'dawn l-aħħar sentejn, l-għadd totali ta' impjegati tal-kumpanija tiegħek żdied, naqas, jew baqa' qisu l-istess? (TAQRAX, TWEĠIBA WAĦDA BISS)
Answer '{ANSWER}' is not a valid Date/Time.
I’m rather sceptical of the European Union, but could change my opinion if radical reform was brought about
Jien pjuttost xettiku dwar l-Unjoni Ewropea, iżda nista' nbiddel l-opinjoni tiegħi jekk issir riforma radikali
16 years or older (not available, call back later)
16-il sena jew ikbar (mhux disponibbli, erġa' ċempel aktar tard)
In general, does the EU conjure up for you a very positive, fairly positive, neutral, fairly negative or very negative image? {#SD15_ins}
B'mod ġenerali, l-Unjoni Ewropea tqanqallek stampa pożittiva ħafna, pjuttost pożittiva, newtrali, pjuttost negattiva jew negattiva ħafna? {#SD15_ins}
ATTIVITAJET FINANZJARJI U MARBUTA MA' ASSIGURAZZJONI
Question '{QUESTION}' ({QUESTION_NUMBER}): Answer '{ANSWER}' ({CATEGORY}) has a response but it is not selected.
Mistoqsija “{QUESTION}” ({QUESTION_NUMBER}): It-tweġiba “{ANSWER}” ({CATEGORY}) għandha risposta iżda mhijiex magħżula.
{#D1X_insert} (DO NOT READ OUT, ONE ANSWER ONLY)
You entered an unexpected value, please review your answer or continue to confirm your response.
Jekk daħħalt valur mhux mistenni, jekk jogħġbok irrevedi t-tweġiba tiegħek jew kompli biex tikkonferma r-rispons tiegħek.
Public administration and defence; compulsory social security
AMMINISTRAZZJONI PUBBLIKA U DIFIŻA; SIGURTÀ SOĊJALI OBBLIGATORJA
There are too few answers, at least {MINANSWERS} are required.
Hemm ftit wisq tweġibiet, huma meħtieġa mill-inqas {MINANSWERS}.
Please enter a value between 0 and 99.
Jekk jogħġbok daħħal valur bejn 0 u 99.
Don't know/No Answer (DO NOT READ OUT)

Thank you for taking part in this survey.
These are all the questions we have for you today.

Grazzi tal-parteċipazzjoni tiegħek f’dan l-istħarriġ.
Dawk huma l-mistoqsijiet kollha li għandna għalik illum.
In the last two years, has your company been involved in any dispute which has gone to court?
Tul dawn l-aħħar sentejn, il-kumpanija tiegħek kienet involuta f'xi disputa li kellha tittella' quddiem qorti?
Answer '{ANSWER}' ({CATEGORY}) has a response but is not selected.
It-tweġiba “{ANSWER}” ({CATEGORY}) għandha risposta iżda mhijiex magħżula.

Hello, My name is …, from (NAME OF NATIONAL INSTITUTE), and I'm conducting an interview for Ipsos Public Affairs, on behalf of one of their clients. We are looking for people aged 15 or over who are willing to share their opinions about the issues of today’s society.
Can I speak to the person in your household, 15 years or older, whose birthday it was most recently? INTERVIEWER ADD IF NECESSARY: this is necessary to ensure everyone has an equal chance to participate, for the survey to be representative of this country’s population.
How old is he or she? Can you pass the phone to this household member?
{#Birthday_ins} Household member with the most recent birthday is:

Hello, Jisimni..., minn (ISEM TAL-ISTITUT NAZZJONALI), u qed inwettaq intervista għal Ipsos Public Affairs, f'isem wieħed mill-klijenti tagħhom. Qegħdin infittxu persuni minn 15-il sena 'l fuq li jixtiequ jaqsmu l-opinjonijiet tagħhom dwar il-kwistjonijiet tas-soċjetà tal-lum.
Nista' nitkellem mal-persuna fid-dar li għandha minn 15-il sena 'l fuq u li kellha l-birthday l-aħħar? INTERVISTATUR ŻID JEKK MEĦTIEĠ: dan huwa meħtieġ biex jiġi żgurat li kulħadd ikollu ċans ugwali li jieħu sehem, sabiex l-istħarriġ ikun rappreżentattiv tal-popolazzjoni ta' dan il-pajjiż.
Kemm għandu jew għandha żmien? Tista' tgħaddi t-telefon lil dan il-membru tad-dar?
{#Birthday_ins} Il-membru tad-dar li kellu/kellha l-birthday l-aħħar huwa/hija:
As far as your current occupation is concerned, would you say you are...? {#D2_ins}
Fir-rigward tal-okkupazzjoni attwali tiegħek, inti tgħid li inti...? {#D2_ins}
What was your company's total turnover in {#CurrentYear_insert_1}? ADD, IF NEEDED: If you are not sure, please provide your best estimate. (READ OUT IF NECESSARY, ONE ANSWER ONLY)
X'kien il-fatturat totali tal-kumpanija tiegħek fl-{#CurrentYear_insert_1}? ŻID, JEKK MEĦTIEĠ: Jekk m'intix ċert(a), jekk jogħġbok agħti l-aħjar stima tiegħek. (AQRA JEKK MEĦTIEĠ, TWEĠIBA WAĦDA BISS)
Activities of extraterritorial organisations and bodies
ATTIVITAJIET TA' ORGANIZZAZZJONIJIET U ENTITAJIET EKSTRATERRITORJALI
European Agency for Safety and Health at Work
Aġenzija Ewropea għas-Sigurtà u s-Saħħa fuq il-Post tax-Xogħol
Which of the following describes how you think of yourself? {#D2_ins}
Liema minn dawn li ġejjin tiddeskrivi x'taħseb int dwarek innifsek? {#D2_ins}
Wholesale and retail trade; repair of motor vehicles and motorcycles
NEGOZJU BL-INGROSSA U BL-IMNUT TA KWALINKWE TIP (INKLUŻ IT-TISWIJA TA' VETTURI BIL-MUTUR U MUTURI)
How many children under the age of 15 are living in your household?
Kemm jgħixu tfal taħt l-età ta’ 15-il sena fid-dar tiegħek?

Hello, My name is …, from (NAME OF NATIONAL INSTITUTE). May I speak with someone with decision making responsibilities (managing director, general manager, CEO, financial director) or someone leading the commercial activities (commercial manger, sales manager, marketing manager) or a legal officer in your company? (IF THE GATEKEEPER ASKS FOR ADDITIONAL INFORMATION) I'm conducting an interview for Ipsos Public Affairs, on behalf of one of their clients. We are contacting (decision makers in) companies across Europe regarding their views on current business topics. The feedback will be used to support policymaking in Europe. I would greatly appreciate being able to speak with him or her to include his/her opinion in the study. INTERVIEWER ADD IF ASKED: CLIENT? Ipsos is conducting this survey for a European public institution. I can only reveal the name of this institution during the interview. WHO TO CONTACT ABOUT THE SURVEY: If you have comments or questions, or any concerns, please send an email to: FlashEB-dataprotection-coordinator@ipsos-online.com (SINGLE ANSWER, DO NOT READ OUT)

Hello, Jisimni..., minn (ISEM TAL-ISTITUT NAZZJONALI). Nista' nitkellem ma' xi ħadd li huwa responsabbli għat-teħid ta' deċiżjonijiet (direttur ġenerali, maniġer ġenerali, CEO, direttur finanzjarju) jew xi ħadd li jmexxi l-attivitajiet kummerċjali (maniġer kummerċjali, maniġer tal-bejgħ, maniġer tal-marketing) jew uffiċjal legali fil-kumpanija tiegħek? (JEKK IL-PERSUNA LI TWIEĠEB TISTAQSI GĦAL AKTAR INFORMAZZJONI) Qed inwettaq intervista għal Ipsos Public Affairs, f'isem wieħed mill-klijenti tagħhom. Qed nikkuntattjaw lil (persuni responsabbli għat-teħid ta' deċiżjonijiet f') kumpaniji madwar l-Ewropa dwar il-fehmiet tagħhom fuq suġġetti kummerċjali attwali. Dan il-feedback se jintuża biex jgħin fit-tfassil ta' politiki fl-Ewropa. Napprezza ħafna jekk inkun nista' nitkellem miegħu jew magħha biex ninkludi l-opinjoni tiegħu/tagħha fl-istudju. INTERVISTATUR ŻID JEKK TIĠI MITLUB: IL-KLIJENT? Ipsos qed twettaq dan l-istħarriġ għal istituzzjoni pubblika Ewropea. Nista' niżvela l-isem ta' dik l-istituzzjoni biss waqt l-intervista. LIL MIN NISTA' NIKKUNTATTJA DWAR DAN L-ISTĦARRIĠ: Jekk għandek xi kummenti jew mistoqsijiet, jew kwalunkwe tħassib, jekk jogħġbok ibgħat email lil: FlashEB-dataprotection-coordinator@ipsos-online.com (TWEĠIBA WAĦDA, TAQRAX)
Interviewer instruction: Do not read, just fill in your interviewer_ID.
Istruzzjoni għall-intervistatur: Taqrax, imla biss l-interviewer_ID tiegħek.
Please enter a value between 1 and 30.
Jekk jogħġbok daħħal valur bejn 1 u 30.
AKKOMODAZZJONI U IKEL ATTIVITAJIET TA' SERVIZZ

Hello, My name is …, from (NAME OF NATIONAL INSTITUTE), and I'm conducting an interview for Ipsos Public Affairs, on behalf of one of their clients. We are looking for people aged 15 or over who are willing to share their opinions about the issues of today’s society. We are conducting this survey across Europe. We would like to speak to your child about this subject (CLARIFY IF NEEDED: your child, aged 15, whose birthday it was most recently).

Hello, Jisimni..., minn (ISEM TAL-ISTITUT NAZZJONALI), u qed inwettaq intervista għal Ipsos Public Affairs, f'isem wieħed mill-klijenti tagħhom. Qegħdin infittxu persuni minn 15-il sena 'l fuq li jixtiequ jaqsmu l-opinjonijiet tagħhom dwar il-kwistjonijiet tas-soċjetà tal-lum. Qed inwettqu dan l-istħarriġ madwar l-Ewropa. L-istħarriġ mhuwiex parti minn kwalunkwe riċerka tas-suq, aħna interessati li nkejlu l-opinjoni pubblika.

Inti l-ġenitur/gwardjan legali tat-tifel/tifla, li għandu/għandha 15-il-sena, li nixtiequ nintervistaw?

These are all the questions we have for you today. It appears that a sufficient number of respondents with a similar profile have already completed this study, or that your profile does not exactly match our needs for this study. We apologize for the inconvenience.

Dawk huma l-mistoqsijiet kollha li għandna għalik illum. Milli jidher għandna numru biżżejjed rispondenti bi profil simili għal tiegħek li diġà lestew dan l-istudju, jew il-profil tiegħek ma jaqbilx eżattament mal-ħtiġijiet tagħna għal dan l-istudju. Niskużaw ruħna għal kull inkonvenjent.

(READ IF TARGET RESPONDENT IS NOT THE PERSON WHO FIRST ANSWERED THE PHONE) Hello, My name is …, from (NAME OF NATIONAL INSTITUTE), and I'm conducting an interview for Ipsos Public Affairs, on behalf of one of their clients. We are looking for people aged 15 or over who are willing to share their opinions about the issues of today’s society. We are conducting this survey across Europe. The survey is not part of any market research, we are interested in measuring public opinion.
(READ FOR ALL RESPONDENTS) I would be grateful if you could spare {#minutes_ins} minutes to participate in this survey. Participation in the survey is voluntary and you can change your mind at any time. All of your answers will remain confidential and will be combined with all other participants’ answers. This means you will not be identifiable in any of the published results. {#CONSENT_ins}
If you would like to read the Data Protection Notice, you can access it at {#intro_link}. This explains the purpose for processing your personal data as well as your data protection rights.
For quality assurance, this phone call may be monitored and recorded.
INTERVIEWER ADD IF ASKED: HOW DID YOU GET MY NUMBER: Your telephone number has been randomly generated by a computer, like all numbers we dial for this research. Our aim is to interview a representative sample of this country’s population.
CLIENT? Ipsos is conducting this survey for the {#Client}. Flash Eurobarometer surveys have as purpose to monitor public opinion in the European Union on a broad range of thematic issues.
WHAT PERSONAL DATA WILL BE COLLECTED: We use your phone number to invite you to take part in this interview and for quality control purposes only. Gender and age information will be collected, as well as personal data from the replies to the interview questions (such as marital status). All of the information you provide will remain confidential, your answers will be combined with all other participants’ answers, and no identifiable data will be shared with Ipsos’ client.
Are you happy to proceed with the interview? {#Birthday_ins}

(AQRA JEKK IR-RISPONDENT FIL-MIRA MHUWIEX IL-PERSUNA LI TWIEĠEB L-EWWEL IT-TELFON) Hello, Jisimni..., minn (ISEM TAL-ISTITUT NAZZJONALI), u qed inwettaq intervista għal Ipsos Public Affairs, f'isem wieħed mill-klijenti tagħhom. Qegħdin infittxu persuni minn 15-il sena 'l fuq li jixtiequ jaqsmu l-opinjonijiet tagħhom dwar il-kwistjonijiet tas-soċjetà tal-lum. Qed inwettqu dan l-istħarriġ madwar l-Ewropa. L-istħarriġ mhuwiex parti minn kwalunkwe riċerka tas-suq, aħna interessati li nkejlu l-opinjoni pubblika.
(AQRA GĦAR-RISPONDENTI KOLLHA) Napprezzaw jekk għandek {#minutes_ins} ftit minuti biex tipparteċipa f'dan l-istħarriġ. Il-parteċipazzjoni f'dan l-istħarriġ hija volontarja, u inti tista' tibdel fehmtek fi kwalunkwe ħin. It-tweġibiet kollha tiegħek kollha se jibqgħu kunfidenzjali u se jiġu kombinati mat-tweġibiet tal-parteċipanti l-oħrajn kollha. Dan ifisser li inti mhux se tkun tista' tiġi identifikat(a) fi kwalunkwe mir-riżultati li jiġu ppubblikati. {#CONSENT_ins}
Jekk tixtieq taqra l-Avviż dwar il-Protezzjoni tad-Data, tista’ taċċessah fuq {#intro_link}. Dan jispjega l-iskop għall-ipproċessar tad-data personali tiegħek kif ukoll id-drittijiet ta' protezzjoni tad-data tiegħek.
Għal raġunijiet ta' kwalità, din it-telefonata tista' tiġi monitorjata u reġistrata.
INTERVISTATUR ŻID JEKK TIĠI MITLUB: KIF SIBT IN-NUMRU TIEGĦI: In-numru tat-telefon tiegħek ġie ġġenerat b'mod każwali minn kompjuter, bħan-numri kollha li nċemplu għal din ir-riċerka. L-għan tagħna huwa li nintervistaw kampjun rappreżentattiv tal-popolazzjoni ta' dan il-pajjiż.
IL-KLIJENT? Ipsos qed twettaq dan l-istħarriġ għal {#Client}. L-istħarriġiet tal-Flash Eurobarometer għandhom l-iskop li jimmonitorjaw l-opinjoni pubblika fl-Unjoni Ewropea dwar firxa wiesgħa ta' kwistjonijiet tematiċi.
LIEMA DATA PERSONALI SE TINĠABAR: Aħna nużaw in-numru tat-telefon tiegħek biex nistednuk tieħu sehem f'din l-intervista u għal skopijiet ta' kontroll tal-kwalità biss. Se tinġabar informazzjoni dwar il-ġeneru u l-età, kif ukoll data personali mit-tweġibiet għall-mistoqsijiet tal-intervista (bħall-istat ċivili). L-informazzjoni kollha li tipprovdi se tibqa' kunfidenzjali, it-tweġibiet tiegħek se jiġu kombinati mat-tweġibiet tal-parteċipanti l-oħra kollha, u l-ebda data identifikabbli mhi se tiġi maqsuma mal-klijent ta' Ipsos.
Tixtieq tkompli bl-intervista? {#Birthday_ins}
Which nationality or nationalities do you hold? {#D3b_ins}
Are you a permanent resident of {#MRK_Country}?
How many employees (in full-time equivalents) does your company currently have? ADD, IF NEEDED: If you are not sure, please provide your best estimate. (READ OUT IF NECESSARY, ONE ANSWER ONLY)

Kemm-il impjegat (f'ekwivalenti għal full-time) għandha l-kumpanija bħalissa? ŻID, JEKK MEĦTIEĠ: Jekk m'intix ċert(a), jekk jogħġbok agħti l-aħjar stima tiegħek. (AQRA JEKK MEĦTIEĠ, TWEĠIBA WAĦDA BISS)
